posts.post_content:
Hello everyone,

I'd like to pick up an N173 for my collection. I'm not as concerned with the technical grade as I am with the eye appeal. An authentic would be great so long as the ad has not been trimmed off. I also don't mind writing on the back. 

If you've got one for sale please do send me a PM.

Thanks.

Good Luck with this post, they are tough issues. And most Collectors don't want to sell

Joe
Hoping to run into someone looking to build a reserve for an upcoming auction.
